lead_paragraph: Because of an editing error, an article on Saturday about legal maneuvering before the trial of the track coach Trevor Graham stemming from a doping investigation failed to give the context in some editions for comments by the Olympic sprinter Maurice Greene, who has been accused of cheating by a drug adviser expected to be a main prosecution witness.
